程序包 ltseed.chatinmc.Utils

类 Request

java.lang.Object
ltseed.chatinmc.Utils.Request
public class Request extends Object
A utility class for making HTTP requests using the Apache HttpClient library and FastJson for JSON serialization/deserialization.
版本:
1.0
作者:
ltseed

  • 方法详细资料

    • post

      public static com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject post(String url, Map<String,String> header, Map<String,Object> params)
      Sends a POST request to the specified URL with the given headers and parameters.
      参数:
      url - the URL to send the request to
      header - a map of header values to include in the request
      params - a map of parameters to include in the request body
      返回:
      the JSON response from the server as a JSONObject, or null if the request fails

    • get

      public static com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject get(String url, Map<String,String> header)
      Sends a GET request to the specified URL with the given headers.
      参数:
      url - the URL to send the request to
      header - a map of header values to include in the request
      返回:
      the JSON response from the server as a JSONObject, or null if the request fails
